title: Guanajuato
summary: Guanajuato (Spanish pronunciation: [gwanaˈxwato] (listen)), officially the Free and Sovereign State of Guanajuato (Spanish: Estado Libre y Soberano de Guanajuato), is one of the 32 states that make up the Federal Entities of Mexico. It is divided into 46 municipalities and its capital city is Guanajuato.
